divs: Sighting DetailsSighting took place around 9:20pm EST in Washington County Pennsylvania. Filmed duration of event and uploaded the footage to youtube. At first it was 2 bright white lights with a small flickering light. Then one smaller light "dims" on beside the two other lights. That smaller light then appears to morph or change into 2 small lights. Then atleast one more light turns on after that. Then all the lights take a formation of a triangle shape. There was atleast 6 white lights on this unknown craft. I did not hear any sound. I don't know what the object was but it did not appear to be an airplane.
trends: There have been 122 other sightings in Pittsburgh
There were no other sightings in Pittsburgh on or around May 20th 2013
Summary: UFO Triangle Fake Plane May 20 2013 Washington County Pennsylvania
